chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21+ 5G has a problem:
It started restarting randomly, even when the system said there was an error and it needed to be updated with software. The problem is that I couldn't update it to the latest version because it's stuck on One UI 4.
As a result, it would only restart without opening the system.

Thanks,

Dear ecomobile

My name is Yuredith from Back Market customer service, I hope you are having an amazing day. 

This customer contacted us because he doesn't have any update about the resolution for the return, can you please send him an update about the repair?

Thanks in advance.

Regards,
Yuredith from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
